name: Boyfriend Bold Bracelet
description: Get them a fresh, clear-cut statement piece that goes with everything they own. Handcrafted in 18k gold vermeil, set with a round cut topaz gemstone.
details: Made in gold vermeil: a thick 18k gold layer on sterling silver.
Adjustable bracelet length: up to 7 inches.

name: Croissant Dôme Hoops
description: Looking like a French girl isnt as difficile as it seems. Handcrafted in vermeil, a thick 18k gold layer on sterling silver. Consider this croissan inspired hoops to make all your Parisian dreams come true.
details: Made in gold vermeil: a thick 18k gold layer on sterling silver.

name: Opal Cluster Necklace
description: This necklace is perfect for all occasions. Even when you don't have one. Handcrafted in 14k solid gold with opal and white sapphire gemstones.

name: Stacker Ring
description: The Stacker is the white tee of rings. It is everyone's go-to because there's nothing it can't go with (trust us). This 14k solid gold essential is the perfect starter ring or addition to anyone's collection.

name: Luxury Watch
description: The Beaded Watch creates a big enough statement to wear alone, but it also plays well with others.

name: Double Curb Bracelet
description: Double the chain, double the gold. This one’s a statement, not a gesture.
